column4: When I try to install the package "luma" I get this error: http://thomasdamgaard.dk/paste/P1497.html
luma: Depends: python-qt3 (>= 3.11) but it is not going to be installed
this gives me:   python-qt3: Depends: python-sip4 (<= 4.10) but 4.10.0-2ubuntu2~karmic1~ppa2 is to be installed
python-sip4 is already the newest version.
Hmm... Ok. Can it be fixed somehow?
python-qt3: Depends: python-sip4 (<= 4.10) but 4.10.0-2ubuntu2~karmic1~ppa2 is to be installed
still get that one on reinstall python-qt3
